mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM users u JOIN review_likes rl ON u.id = rl.user_id WHERE rl.review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY rl.created_at DESC
